name: Aria (demo)
description:
Aria is a hack n slash, top down, roguelite game set within a fantasy world inhabited by dangerous mobs. 

The player embarks out on a challenge to clear the Hunter Trials - A dangerous rite of passage to become a Hunter.

If you like our demo stay tuned for the full release on Steam coming soon!

Follow us on our social media for updates:
https://twitter.com/OverdewStudio
